title: Remove tab options from Designers and Design Packages menu

requirements.summary: Replace tab navigation in Designers and Design Packages dropdown menu with simple list items that directly link to their respective pages
acceptanceCriteria: The dropdown menu in SiteHeader no longer displays tabs
Both 'Designers' and 'Design Packages' appear as simple list items in the dropdown
Clicking 'Designers' navigates directly to the designers directory page
Clicking 'Design Packages' navigates directly to the packages page
The dropdown maintains the same visual styling as other site navigation elements

file_operations.description: Remove the tab navigation interface from the Designers and Design Packages dropdown menu. Replace the tab-based navigation with a simple dropdown list containing two direct link items: 'Designers' (linking to /designers) and 'Design Packages' (linking to /packages). Ensure the dropdown styling remains consistent with other navigation elements in the site header. Remove any state management or tab selection logic that is no longer needed after removing the tabs.
